product.name: Amazon Basics Room Darkening Blackout Curtain Rod - 28" to 48", Nickel
product.description: Product Description Amazon Basics Room Darkening Blackout Curtain Rod - 28" to 48", Nickel From the Manufacturer Amazon Basics
product.bullet_points:
• Curtain rod for window treatment in a bedroom, living room, or other living space
• Made of durable metal with a Nickel finish
• Adjustable length from 28 - 48 inches end-to-end, excluding finials; 20 - 40 inches including wraparound ends; wall mount hardware and instructions included for easy install
• Curved at both ends, wrapping curtains around the window from end to end, blocking out light while insulating the room
• 5/8-inch rod diameter capable of handling moderately fabrics; can hold up to 16 pounds
